name: H E double scary sticks||a horror platformer
name_original: H E double scary sticks||a horror platformer
description:
If you want to play horror games, but you don't like SUPER scary stuff, then 'H E double scary sticks'  is the game for you! The only scary parts about it are the jumpscares, which only occur when you die! 

Please play this game with at least 35% volume for the best experience.

WARNING! THIS GAME IS NOT SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE WITH HEART CONDITIONS! (I think)
